content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #4336:

@cfallin if you want to rebase this one I think it should be good to merge

cfallin commented on issue #4336:

Rebased, will merge once tests are green.

alexcrichton commented on issue #4336:

Given the green status on https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/4332 and the prior green status on https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/4333 for the release-0.38.0 branch I'm actually gonna go ahead and merge this to help reduce our CI load a bit (which is a bit overloaded at the moment...).

I'll wait for the full green sign off on https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/4339 which I will subsequently rebase over this and put the final touches on the release notes there (mostly the simd fixes)
